name: heeq1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(whe(c0, c2), whe(c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: mpan2(wceq(c0, c1), wb(whe(c0, c2), whe(c1, c2)), wceq(c2, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(whe(c0, c2), whe(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, c2)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2)), wb(whe(c0, c2), whe(c1, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 →(c0[hereditary]c2 ↔ c1[hereditary]c2))
⊣ c2 = c2
⊣ ((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c2)→(c0[hereditary]c2 ↔ c1[hereditary]c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(whe(c0, c2), whe(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, c2)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2)), wb(whe(c0, c2), whe(c1, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 →(c0[hereditary]c2 ↔ c1[hereditary]c2))
⊣ c2 = c2
⊣ ((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c2)→(c0[hereditary]c2 ↔ c1[hereditary]c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(whe(c0, c2), whe(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2)), wb(whe(c0, c2), whe(c1, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 →(c0[hereditary]c2 ↔ c1[hereditary]c2))
⊣ ((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c2)→(c0[hereditary]c2 ↔ c1[hereditary]c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c2)), wb(whe(c0, c2), whe(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(whe(c0, c2), whe(c1, c2)))

comment: Equality law for relations being herditary over a class. (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.)
